com.io7m.jcanephora.renderstate

Class JCGLRenderState.Builder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.io7m.jcanephora.renderstate.JCGLRenderState.Builder
  • Enclosing class:
    JCGLRenderState

    public static final class JCGLRenderState.Builder
extends Object
    Builds instances of type JCGLRenderState. Initialize attributes and then invoke the build() method to create an immutable instance.

    Builder is not thread-safe and generally should not be stored in a field or collection, but instead used immediately to create instances.

    • Method Detail

      • from

        public final JCGLRenderState.Builder from(JCGLRenderStateType instance)
        Fill a builder with attribute values from the provided JCGLRenderStateType instance. Regular attribute values will be replaced with those from the given instance. Absent optional values will not replace present values.
        Parameters:
        instance - The instance from which to copy values
        Returns:
        this builder for use in a chained invocation
